featured.text: Researchers at Purdue University recently concluded that a compound in green tea 17 the growth of cancer cells.

definition.zh_def: 普渡大學，位於美國印第安納州的一所著名公立研究型大學。
definition.en_def: Purdue University, a prominent public research university located in Indiana, USA.
definition.example: She decided to attend Purdue to study engineering.
